result.name: Identification of new QTL for salt tolerance from rice variety Pokkali
result.description: We initiated the project to identify new QTL regulating the salt tolerance in rice. We carried out linkage mapping using 148 recombinant inbred lines derived from IR29 and Pokkali. The extracted genomic DNA was subjected to genotyping with single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) markers using an Affymetrix Axiom Rice 56k SNP Genotyping Array.The manuscript related to the project is "Identification of new QTL for salt tolerance from rice variety Pokkali".
